dimensions: H x diam.: 15.3 x 17 cm (6 x 6 11/16 in.)
title: Vase
description: Globular form, the brass surface with caramel-colored patination and black and cinnabar-colored lacquer geometric decoration of curving lines and dashes, and cinnabar and gun-metal gray colored fields; circular mouth with nickled collar.
name: Vase
